櫱字的基本解释

櫱
niè
同“蘖”。

櫱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》魚列切，入薛，疑。］
［《廣韻》五割切，入曷，疑。］
(1)同“蘖”。树木砍去后重生的枝条。亦泛指物始生。
(2)通“孼”。

櫱字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫱； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页561第33
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】?魚列切，音孽。【說文】伐木餘也。○按《說文》?本字。?，古文。櫱、?，重文。《韻會》《正韻》俱从艸，《今文尚書·盤庚》由蘖、《詩·商頌》三蘖、《孟子》萌蘖，俱作櫱。　又【唐韻】五葛切，岸入聲。義同。　又姓。【姓苑】東莞人。本姓薛，避仇改爲櫱。　又叶逆約切，音近虐。【蘇軾·園中草木詩】牽牛獨何畏，詰曲自牙櫱。走尋荆與榛，如有夙昔約。

櫱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
櫱字的起名意思

暂无。

shoot from an old stump
Basic explanation of words
shoot from an old stump
niè
Same as "Tiller".
shoot from an old stump
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guang Yun" cut the fish line, enter Xue, doubt. ]
["Guangyun" five cuts, enters, suspicious. ]
(1) Same as "Tiller". The branches of a tree that are regenerated after being cut. It also refers to the beginning of things.
(2) Through "Mi".
shoot from an old stump
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　櫱; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 561 33
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Jiyun]? Fish list cut, sound evil. [Said the text] More than logging. ○Press "Said Wen"? This word. ?, Ancient Chinese. Qin, ?, heavy text. "Yunhui" and "Zhengyun" are all from Congcun, "Jinwen Shangshu·Pangeng" is composed of Congchou, "Poetry·Songsong" three Congs, and "Mencius" Meng Cong.　[Tang Yun] The five ge cuts, the shore enters the sound. The same meaning.　Another last name. [Surname Garden] A native of Dongguan. His surname was Xue, and his surname was changed to Qiu.　 Ye Ye cuts against the appointment, the sound is close to abuse. [Su Shi·Verdant Poems in the Garden] What a fear is that a morning cow is alone, and the cross-talk is from the teeth. Walk to find Jing and Zhen, if there is a past appointment.
